original: 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang / spros pa la dga' ba dang / rigs pa med pa'i gtam dang / bdag 'dzin pa dang / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / mar mi 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang / spros pa la dga' ba dang / rigs pa med pa'i gtam dang / bdag 'dzin pa dang / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / mar mi 'dzin pa dang /
translated: They are delighting in busyness, delighting in elaboration, speaking without reason, grasping at self, grasping at sentient beings, grasping at life force, grasping at person, not grasping at mother,

original: phar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / sman pa'i tha snyad dang khyim sun 'byin pa la dga' ba dang / pho nyar 'gro ba dang / khyim pa'i las kyi mtha' byed du 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: phar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / sman pa'i tha snyad dang khyim sun 'byin pa la dga' ba dang / pho nyar 'gro ba dang / khyim pa'i las kyi mtha' byed du 'jug pa dang /
translated: not grasping at father, not grasping at mendicants, not grasping at brahmins, the conventions of physicians, delighting in the faults of the household, acting as a messenger, engaging in the activities of householders,

original: khyim pa'i 'du 'dzi byed pa dang / khyim pa'i go re long byed pa dang / lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu 'byin pas khyim 'jig pa dang / gcer bu pa'i sdom pa bdag gir byed pa dang / gcer bu pa srel pa dang /
analyzed: khyim pa'i 'du 'dzi byed pa dang / khyim pa'i go re long byed pa dang / lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu 'byin pas khyim 'jig pa dang / gcer bu pa'i sdom pa bdag gir byed pa dang / gcer bu pa srel pa dang /
translated: engaging in the busyness of householders, being the go-between of householders, destroying households by giving away leaves, flowers, and fruits, taking up the vows of the naked, and supporting the naked.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes spong ba dang / lo nyi shu ma tshang bar bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / yan lag ma tshang bar bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / 'bru ma btsos pa byin len byed pa dang / sha ma btsos pa byin len byed pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes spong ba dang / lo nyi shu ma tshang bar bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / yan lag ma tshang bar bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / 'bru ma btsos pa byin len byed pa dang / sha ma btsos pa byin len byed pa dang /
translated: It is to abandon supramundane wisdom, to be fully ordained without having completed twenty years, to be fully ordained with incomplete limbs, to receive alms of uncooked grains, to receive alms of uncooked meat,

original: gser dang dngul len pa dang / bdag tu smra ba la mi smod pa dang / bdag shes pa ma yin pa dang / gang zag gzhan dang gzhan shes par byed pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / sdom pa lhod pa dang / gya gyu byed pa dang /
analyzed: gser dang dngul len pa dang / bdag tu smra ba la mi smod pa dang / bdag shes pa ma yin pa dang / gang zag gzhan dang gzhan shes par byed pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / sdom pa lhod pa dang / gya gyu byed pa dang /
translated: to accept gold and silver, to not criticize those who speak of a self, to not know oneself, to make others know other persons, to lie, to loosen one’s vows, to be deceitful,

original: dad pa med pa dang / sran chung ba dang / byas pa mi shes pa dang / ma rig pa dang / le lo dang / gnyid dang rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang /
analyzed: dad pa med pa dang / sran chung ba dang / byas pa mi shes pa dang / ma rig pa dang / le lo dang / gnyid dang rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang /
translated: to be without faith, to be weak, to not know what has been done, to be ignorant, to be lazy, to be sleepy and agitated, to regret, to be angry, to bear grudges, to conceal,

original: chags pa dang / sgyu dang g-yo dang phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / khrel med pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / rgyags pa dang / bag med pa dang / khengs pa dang / kun nas rtsom pa dang / dga' ba med pa dang /
analyzed: chags pa dang / sgyu dang g-yo dang phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / khrel med pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / rgyags pa dang / bag med pa dang / khengs pa dang / kun nas rtsom pa dang / dga' ba med pa dang /
translated: deception, dishonesty, jealousy, stinginess, shamelessness, lack of embarrassment, arrogance, carelessness, conceit, undertaking, lack of joy,

original: sgyid lug pa dang / sgral ba dang / zas kyis dregs pa dang / sems zhum pa dang / nga rgyal dang mngon @80b ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / chung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /
analyzed: sgyid lug pa dang / sgral ba dang / zas kyis dregs pa dang / sems zhum pa dang / nga rgyal dang mngon @80b ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / chung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /
translated: laziness, lack of liberation, pride in food, mental depression, pride, overweening pride, extreme pride, pride, slight pride,

original: tshul 'chos dang kha gsag dang gzogs slong dang / thob kyis 'jal ba dang / chos dang mi mthun pa dang / rnyed pas rnyed pa sgrub pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po nyams pa dang /
analyzed: tshul 'chos dang kha gsag dang gzogs slong dang / thob kyis 'jal ba dang / chos dang mi mthun pa dang / rnyed pas rnyed pa sgrub pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po nyams pa dang /
translated: hypocrisy, flattery, begging, extortion, unrighteousness, acquiring gain through gain, degeneration of the aggregate of morality, degeneration of the aggregate of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi phung po nyams pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po nyams pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po nyams pa dang / sangs rgyas la ma dad pa dang / chos la ma dad pa dang / dge 'dun la ma dad pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi phung po nyams pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po nyams pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po nyams pa dang / sangs rgyas la ma dad pa dang / chos la ma dad pa dang / dge 'dun la ma dad pa dang /
translated: lack of faith in the Buddha, lack of faith in the Dharma, lack of faith in the Saṅgha,

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches pa dang / tshe 'di la gtso bor byed pa dang / tshe phyi ma'i chos la gces par mi byed pa dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin can yin te /
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches pa dang / tshe 'di la gtso bor byed pa dang / tshe phyi ma'i chos la gces par mi byed pa dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin can yin te /
translated: lack of confidence in the ripening of karma, making this life the most important, not cherishing the Dharma of the next life, doubt, uncertainty, hesitation, and a fearful nature.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gang zag 'di dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la ngan skyugs dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gang zag 'di dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la ngan skyugs dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Śāriputra, these persons should be known as the dregs of this Dharma and Vinaya.”

original: mi gtsang pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa dang / mi gtsang pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa dang / mi gtsang ba'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa dang / 'tsho ba ma dag pa gang yin pa de dag ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi gtsang pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa dang / mi gtsang pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa dang / mi gtsang ba'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa dang / 'tsho ba ma dag pa gang yin pa de dag ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They are those who have impure physical actions, impure verbal actions, impure mental actions, and impure livelihood. When their bodies disintegrate, after death, they fall into the hells.

original: de dag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan yang dge ba don du gnyer pa rnams dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa rnams kyis yongs su spong ba'i 'os yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan yang dge ba don du gnyer pa rnams dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa rnams kyis yongs su spong ba'i 'os yin no //
translated: They are to be rejected by the Buddhas, by the Buddhas’ disciples, and likewise by others who seek what is wholesome and who wish to attain complete nirvāṇa.

original: sh'a ri'i bu dper na tsandan dmar po de ngan skyugs blugs pa'i snod der bcug na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu dper na tsandan dmar po de ngan skyugs blugs pa'i snod der bcug na /
translated: “Śāriputra, suppose that red sandalwood were placed in a container that also contained feces.🔽It would become impure and contemptible.”

original: de yang mi gtsang bar 'gyur zhing smad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo sde de nyid las /
analyzed: de yang mi gtsang bar 'gyur zhing smad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo sde de nyid las /
translated: And the same sūtra says,

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dge slong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag shes nas /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dge slong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag shes nas /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when a monk who has broken the precepts hears these kinds of true sūtras taught by the Tathāgata,

original: dga' ba'am mgu ba mi 'thob cing /
analyzed: dga' ba'am mgu ba mi 'thob cing /
translated: he will not attain joy or delight.

original: bdag nyid la lhag par yang gnod par byed de /🔽rang gi spod la ma ngan pa la kun du bltas nas /
analyzed: bdag nyid la lhag par yang gnod par byed de / rang gi spod la ma ngan pa la kun du bltas nas /
translated: He will only bring harm upon himself.🔽He will look down on his own precepts.

original: rang nyid yid gnyis za bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rang nyid yid gnyis za bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: He will be full of doubts about himself.

original: mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag ni bdag kho na'i ched du gsungs kyi /
analyzed: mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag ni bdag kho na'i ched du gsungs kyi /
translated: He will think, ‘These kinds of sūtras were taught only for me.

original: gzhan la ma yin no /
analyzed: gzhan la ma yin no /
translated: They were not taught for others.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar bdag kho na'i kun du snang ngo snyam mo //🔽sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni dge slong tshul khrims @81a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag kho na'i kun du snang ngo snyam mo // sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni dge slong tshul khrims @81a * //
translated: Because it is only I who appear to have these.’

original: ral pa rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos yin te /
analyzed: ral pa rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos yin te /
translated: “Śāriputra, this is the unshared Dharma of monks who have broken the precepts.

original: des de thos nas thog ma kho nar khro ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des de thos nas thog ma kho nar khro ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: When they hear it, they will first give rise to anger.

original: de khyo ba'i zil gyis non nas dge slong chos smra ba la ma dad pa skyed par byed de /
analyzed: de khyo ba'i zil gyis non nas dge slong chos smra ba la ma dad pa skyed par byed de /
translated: Having been overwhelmed by the husband, he generates lack of faith in the bhikṣu dharmabhāṇaka.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di la 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smod cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di la 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smod cing /
translated: He disparages this kind of sūtra taught by the Tathāgata, saying, ‘This is not taught by the Buddha.’🔽He makes sentient beings think that way.”

original: skye bo la 'du shes su byed do zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /
analyzed: skye bo la 'du shes su byed do zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /
translated: And in that very sūtra it is said:

original: sh'a ri'i bu khyod la go bar bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu khyod la go bar bya'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, you should understand,

original: khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: you should comprehend,

original: gang yang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de lta bu dang ldan pa'i mi de dag rtag par rgyun du bar chad med pa lo brgya'i bar du bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po bsags pa bas /
analyzed: gang yang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de lta bu dang ldan pa'i mi de dag rtag par rgyun du bar chad med pa lo brgya'i bar du bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po bsags pa bas /
translated: that if those people who possess such paths of the ten nonvirtues were to constantly, always, and continuously accumulate a mass of demerit for a hundred years,

original: dge slong tshul khrims ral pa gang zhig bstan pa 'di la drang srong gi rgyal mtshan gyis g-yogs nas /
analyzed: dge slong tshul khrims ral pa gang zhig bstan pa 'di la drang srong gi rgyal mtshan gyis g-yogs nas /
translated: compared to that, if a bhikṣu who has torn the vows of morality were to cover himself with the banner of a sage in this teaching

original: dad pas byin pa la zhag gcig longs spyod par byed na /
analyzed: dad pas byin pa la zhag gcig longs spyod par byed na /
translated: and enjoy for one day the offerings of the faithful,🔽“

original: de bas ni ches mang du 'di mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas ni ches mang du 'di mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, he creates much more nonvirtuous karma.

original: gang tshul khrims ral pa'i dge slong 'di ni nyin zhag gcig dad pas byin pa la longs spyod na /
analyzed: gang tshul khrims ral pa'i dge slong 'di ni nyin zhag gcig dad pas byin pa la longs spyod na /
translated: If a monk who has violated his ethics enjoys the offerings of the faithful for a single day,🔽he creates much more nonvirtuous karma than that.

original: de nyid de dag las mi dge ba'i rtsa ba ches mang du mngon par 'du byed pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /
analyzed: de nyid de dag las mi dge ba'i rtsa ba ches mang du mngon par 'du byed pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /
translated: And the same sutra says:

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dge slong ni bre mo'i gtam la dga' ba dang / bre mo'i gtam la mngon par dga' ba phrag dog can yin no //🔽tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'khor can yin no //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dge slong ni bre mo'i gtam la dga' ba dang / bre mo'i gtam la mngon par dga' ba phrag dog can yin no // tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'khor can yin no //
translated: Moreover, Shariputra, a monk who has violated his ethics delights in idle speech and takes pleasure in idle speech. He is jealous.🔽He has a retinue of those who have violated their ethics.

original: tshul khrims 'chal pa bsten pa dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam la mi dga' ba yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal pa bsten pa dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam la mi dga' ba yin no //
translated: He does not like the teachings on ethics.

original: mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag dang mi mthun par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag dang mi mthun par byed pa yin no //
translated: He opposes profound sutras such as this one.

original: mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag smra ba la mi mthun par byed cing rtsod pa dang / bstan pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su lta bar byed pa dang / lag pas gdong 'gebs pa dang / bar snang la lta bar byed pa dang /
analyzed: mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag smra ba la mi mthun par byed cing rtsod pa dang / bstan pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su lta bar byed pa dang / lag pas gdong 'gebs pa dang / bar snang la lta bar byed pa dang /
translated: They will dispute and argue with those who teach such sūtras as these. They will not delight in the teachings. They will look around in all directions. They will cover their faces with their hands. They will look up into the sky.

original: stan las langs te 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la smod pa dang / chos smra ba la khro bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: stan las langs te 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la smod pa dang / chos smra ba la khro bar byed pa yin no //
translated: They will stand up and leave. They will disparage the speech of the Tathāgata. They will be angry with the Dharma teachers.

original: de mi dge ba dang ldan zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de mi dge ba dang ldan zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be unwholesome, and due to their physical, verbal, and mental misdeeds, they will go to the lower realms.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon brgyad pa yin te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon brgyad pa yin te /
translated: Śāriputra, this is the eighth fault of a morally undisciplined monk’s immoral conduct.

original: ngan song @81b rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir kun du zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: ngan song @81b rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir kun du zhugs pa yin no //
translated: They are fully committed to going to the lower realms.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa ni yon tan sgrogs pas slob dpon gtso bor byed pa yin /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa ni yon tan sgrogs pas slob dpon gtso bor byed pa yin /
translated: Moreover, Śāriputra, a monk who has faulty morality makes the preceptor his chief concern by proclaiming his good qualities.

original: grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bstod pas mkhan po gtso bor byed pa yin no //
analyzed: grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bstod pas mkhan po gtso bor byed pa yin no //
translated: He makes the master his chief concern by praising his fame, reputation, and renown.

original: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i ming yongs su bsgrags pas 'tsho ba yongs su sgrub pa dang grims pa dang gtogs 'dod che ba yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i ming yongs su bsgrags pas 'tsho ba yongs su sgrub pa dang grims pa dang gtogs 'dod che ba yin no //
translated: He makes a living by proclaiming the names of those who have morality, and he is greedy and acquisitive.

original: dper na bya rog bzhin du dge 'dun gyi ming gis bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams yongs su sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na bya rog bzhin du dge 'dun gyi ming gis bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams yongs su sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Like a crow, he makes a living by using the name of the Saṅgha to obtain robes, alms-food, bedding and seats, and medicines for the sick.

original: mthu dang ldan pa dang lus kyi 'jo sgeg la brtson pa yin no //
analyzed: mthu dang ldan pa dang lus kyi 'jo sgeg la brtson pa yin no //
translated: He is powerful and is devoted to physical adornment.

original: ngo tsha med pa dang 'dzem pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: ngo tsha med pa dang 'dzem pa med pa yin no //
translated: He is shameless and has no sense of decency.

original: tshig thun tshags su smra ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa rgod pa yin no //
analyzed: tshig thun tshags su smra ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa rgod pa yin no //
translated: He is a chatterbox.

original: rigs nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs nyams pa yin no //
translated: He is a person of low family.

original: bud med la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: bud med la brten pa yin no //
translated: He is a person who depends on women.

original: skyes pa la mi brten pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes pa la mi brten pa yin no //
translated: He is a person who does not depend on men.

original: shin tu yongs su 'dris par byed pas gus pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: shin tu yongs su 'dris par byed pas gus pa med pa yin no //
translated: He is a person who is disrespectful because he is too familiar.

original: de'i bsngags pa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin yang mi smra'o //
analyzed: de'i bsngags pa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin yang mi smra'o //
translated: Even the gods, nāgas, and yakṣas do not praise him.

original: de'i bsngags pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang gsung bar mi 'gyur ro /
analyzed: de'i bsngags pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang gsung bar mi 'gyur ro /
translated: Even the blessed buddhas do not praise him.

original: 'tshe ba la dpa' ba dang dge 'dun gyi tha snyad dang ldan pa kun byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'tshe ba la dpa' ba dang dge 'dun gyi tha snyad dang ldan pa kun byed pa yin no //
translated: He is a person who is a hero in quarrels and who does everything that is contrary to the monastic code.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyi dbang phyug 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyi dbang phyug 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Śāriputra, such a person is one who desires the authority of the Saṅgha.

original: gang ci la bsngags kyang ma dris par smra pa yin no //
analyzed: gang ci la bsngags kyang ma dris par smra pa yin no //
translated: He is a person who speaks without being asked and who praises whatever is said.

original: chos gos tshol ba yin no //
analyzed: chos gos tshol ba yin no //
translated: He is a person who seeks robes.

original: gzhan tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la glags lta ba la brtson pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la glags lta ba la brtson pa yin no //
translated: He is a person who is intent on looking for faults in others who are morally disciplined.

original: mtshungs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshungs par byed pa yin no //
translated: He is a maker of equals.

original: dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i chos len pa yin no //
analyzed: dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i chos len pa yin no //
translated: He is a holder of non-Dharma and a receiver of non-Dharma.

original: tshogs la dga' ba yin no //
analyzed: tshogs la dga' ba yin no //
translated: He is a lover of assemblies.

original: rtsod pa 'bar bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rtsod pa 'bar bar byed pa yin no //
translated: He is a maker of disputes.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon dgu pa yin te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon dgu pa yin te /
translated: Śāriputra, this is the ninth fault of a monk with faulty morality.

original: ngan song rab tu rdzogs par bya bar kun du zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: ngan song rab tu rdzogs par bya bar kun du zhugs pa yin no //
translated: He is one who has set out to perfect the lower realms.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa ni rtsod pa len pa yin no //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa ni rtsod pa len pa yin no //
translated: Śāriputra, furthermore, a monk with faulty morality takes up disputes.

original: 'thab mos dga' ba 'thob pa dang / chos gos la zhen pa yin no //
analyzed: 'thab mos dga' ba 'thob pa dang / chos gos la zhen pa yin no //
translated: He is one who obtains delight in fighting, and is attached to Dharma robes.

original: 'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba dang nyal ba'i bde ba la gzhol ba yin no //🔽bsngags pa rnyed na dga' ba dang bshes pa'i khyim dang slong mo ster @82a * //
analyzed: 'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba dang nyal ba'i bde ba la gzhol ba yin no // bsngags pa rnyed na dga' ba dang bshes pa'i khyim dang slong mo ster @82a * //
translated: He is one who goes to bad migrations, and is devoted to the pleasure of sleep.

original: pa'i khyim la 'chums pa yin no //
analyzed: pa'i khyim la 'chums pa yin no //
translated: He is one who delights in gain and praise, and is attached to the homes of friends and the homes of those who give alms.

original: khyim la phrag dog byed pa dang gnas la phrag dog byed pa yin no //
analyzed: khyim la phrag dog byed pa dang gnas la phrag dog byed pa yin no //
translated: They are jealous of the houses and jealous of the dwellings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: kye ma bdag gi 'di dge slong de dag gis ma shes kyang ci ma rung snyam pa sems pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kye ma bdag gi 'di dge slong de dag gis ma shes kyang ci ma rung snyam pa sems pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they think, “Oh, I hope that the monks don’t know about this.”

original: tshul khrims la sdang ba yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims la sdang ba yin no //
translated: They hate morality.

original: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la kun du dga' ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa 'ba' zhig lhag par smra ba yin te /
analyzed: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la kun du dga' ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa 'ba' zhig lhag par smra ba yin te /
translated: They delight in immorality and they praise only generosity.

original: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / nye bar zhi ba rnams kyi ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / nye bar zhi ba rnams kyi ma yin no //
translated: They don’t praise morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom.

original: dgon pa'i gnas dben pa chung zad don gyi sgo nas sam chung zad yi ge'i sgo nas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dgon pa'i gnas dben pa chung zad don gyi sgo nas sam chung zad yi ge'i sgo nas ni ma yin te /
translated: They don’t praise the solitary places that are suitable for ascetics, either because of their meaning or because of the words.

original: dge slong ngo tsha shes pa rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa spyod pas mngon par brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong ngo tsha shes pa rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa spyod pas mngon par brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: They are dedicated to disparaging the monks who are ashamed.

original: de dge slong sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la chung zad don gyi sgo nas sam /
analyzed: de dge slong sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la chung zad don gyi sgo nas sam /
translated: This is a slight benefit for the monks who have the qualities of purification.

original: chung zad yi ge'i sgo nas kyang bsngags pa ma yin pa smra zhing /
analyzed: chung zad yi ge'i sgo nas kyang bsngags pa ma yin pa smra zhing /
translated: They are not at all praising the virtues of the monks, either in fact or in words.

original: ci nas kyang skyon 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: ci nas kyang skyon 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: They are finding fault with them in every way.

original: rigs rgyud smra ba la zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs rgyud smra ba la zhugs pa yin no //
translated: They are engaged in talking about their family lineage.🔽They are talking about their relatives of the past.🔽They are teaching the Dharma for the sake of gain.🔽They are talking with a forked tongue out of fear.🔽They are not abandoning their own people.

original: sngon gyi nye du la smos pa dang / ci'i rgyus chos ston kyang 'di ltar bkren pa'i phyir yin pa dang / bag tsha ba'i lce gnyis su smra ba dang / rang gi skye bo mi spong ba dang / skye bo mang pos myur du zil gyis mnan pa 'thob pa dang yid du mi 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi nye du la smos pa dang / ci'i rgyus chos ston kyang 'di ltar bkren pa'i phyir yin pa dang / bag tsha ba'i lce gnyis su smra ba dang / rang gi skye bo mi spong ba dang / skye bo mang pos myur du zil gyis mnan pa 'thob pa dang yid du mi 'thad pa yin no //
translated: They are quickly overcome by the multitude.🔽They are not pleasing.

original: tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la kha zer ba dang / gdams ngag smra ba'i skyes pa dang / bud med rnams la mi bsten pa dang / de mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chang ba dang / ston pa gang yin pa de dag yid la mi 'thad pa dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la kha zer ba dang / gdams ngag smra ba'i skyes pa dang / bud med rnams la mi bsten pa dang / de mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chang ba dang / ston pa gang yin pa de dag yid la mi 'thad pa dang /
translated: They will not be pleased with those who teach this kind of sūtra, or with those who hold this kind of sūtra.

original: mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di ston pa rnams la dga' ba dang mgu bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag la yang sdang zhing yid du mi 'ong bas /
analyzed: mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di ston pa rnams la dga' ba dang mgu bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag la yang sdang zhing yid du mi 'ong bas /
translated: They will be hostile to those who teach this kind of sūtra, and will not be pleased with them.

original: tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa yin no //
translated: They will not praise moral discipline.

original: 'di lta bu'i mdo sde ston pa rnams kyi drung du nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i mdo sde ston pa rnams kyi drung du nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: They will not approach those who teach this kind of sūtra.

original: nye bar song na yang slar myur du ldog pa dang / ltos pa med par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: nye bar song na yang slar myur du ldog pa dang / ltos pa med par ston pa yin no //
translated: Even if they do approach them, they will quickly turn away and teach without regard.

original: byung rgyal du smra ba dang khyim pa nye du ma yin pa la nye ngur  smos pa yin no //
analyzed: byung rgyal du smra ba dang khyim pa nye du ma yin pa la nye ngur  smos pa yin no //
translated: They will speak without restraint and address householders who are not relatives as if they were close.

original: dbang phyug gi phyir dbye bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i phyogs la smod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang phyug gi phyir dbye bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i phyogs la smod par byed pa yin no //
translated: They are divided for the sake of the powerful, and they disparage those who are moral.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul @82b khrims kyi skyon bcu pa yin te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul @82b khrims kyi skyon bcu pa yin te /
translated: Śāriputra, this is the tenth fault of a morally corrupt monk’s broken morality.🔽He is engaged in completing the lower realms.”

original: ngan song yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir kun du zhugs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /
analyzed: ngan song yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir kun du zhugs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /
translated: And the same sūtra says,

original: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de lta bas na /
translated: “Śāriputra, for that reason

original: de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu blun po de dag gi don du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di rab tu ston par mi mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu blun po de dag gi don du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di rab tu ston par mi mdzad do //
translated: the Tathāgata does not teach this kind of sūtra for the sake of those foolish people.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu tshul khrims ral pa'i dge slong 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di thos nas nyams par bya ba'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu tshul khrims ral pa'i dge slong 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di thos nas nyams par bya ba'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Śāriputra, those monks who have broken the moral discipline will, when they hear this kind of sūtra taught by the Tathāgata, engage in disparaging it.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu de la dad pas byin pa rnams la longs spyod par byed pa dag ni chom rkun chen po yin no //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de la dad pas byin pa rnams la longs spyod par byed pa dag ni chom rkun chen po yin no //
translated: Śāriputra, those who enjoy the offerings of the faithful are great thieves.

original: sh'a ri'i bu chos 'dul ba 'di thos nas /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu chos 'dul ba 'di thos nas /
translated: Śāriputra, having heard this Dharma and Vinaya,

original: dga' la rangs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni lhag par dge slong sdig can yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dga' la rangs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni lhag par dge slong sdig can yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: one should know that those who do not delight in it are especially sinful monks.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la ni /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la ni /
translated: Śāriputra, it is because for monks who are endowed with morality,

original: yang na tshul khrims kyi gtam mam /
analyzed: yang na tshul khrims kyi gtam mam /
translated: there is no unpleasant talk about morality,

original: yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi gtam mam /
analyzed: yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi gtam mam /
translated: no unpleasant talk about samādhi,

original: yang na shes rab kyi gtam mam /
analyzed: yang na shes rab kyi gtam mam /
translated: no unpleasant talk about wisdom,

original: yang na kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi gtam de lta bu gang yang yid du mi 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi gtam de lta bu gang yang yid du mi 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and no unpleasant talk about the Dharma that leads to disenchantment.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di thos na gsum yid mi bde bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di thos na gsum yid mi bde bar 'gyur te /
translated: Śāriputra, when they hear this kind of sūtra, three people will be unhappy.

original: gsum po de dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum po de dag gang zhe na /
translated: Who are those three?

original: tshul khrims ral pa'i dge slong gang yin pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi dge slong gang yin pa dang / chos ma yin pa'i gtam chos kyi gtam ltar bcos pas yongs su ma dag pa ston pa'i dge slong gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims ral pa'i dge slong gang yin pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi dge slong gang yin pa dang / chos ma yin pa'i gtam chos kyi gtam ltar bcos pas yongs su ma dag pa ston pa'i dge slong gang yin pa'o //
translated: the monk who is a hypocrite, the monk who is arrogant, and the monk who teaches a false doctrine as if it were the true doctrine.

original: gzhan yang gsum yid mi bde bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gsum yid mi bde bar 'gyur te /
translated: “Again, there are three more things that cause distress:

original: gsum po de dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum po de dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: bdag tu lta ba dang srog tu lta ba dang gang zag tu lta ba'o //
analyzed: bdag tu lta ba dang srog tu lta ba dang gang zag tu lta ba'o //
translated: The view of the self, the view of a living being, and the view of a person.

original: gzhan yang gsum yid mi bde bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gsum yid mi bde bar 'gyur te /
translated: “Again, there are three more things that cause distress:

original: gsum po de dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum po de dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba'o zhes gsungs pa dang / mdo de nyid las /
analyzed: phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba'o zhes gsungs pa dang / mdo de nyid las /
translated: The view of the aggregates, the view of the elements, and the view of the sense-spheres.🔽” And in that same sutra it says:

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar mdo sde de ni /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar mdo sde de ni /
translated: “Śāriputra, in this way,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na /
translated: when the Tathāgata has passed into nirvāṇa,

original: dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dga' ba dang mgu bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dga' ba dang mgu bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: this sutra will delight and gladden the monks who have good moral discipline.

original: sh'a ri'i bu mdo sde 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyis kun du bzung zhing tshul khrims 'chal pas yongs su spangs bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu mdo sde 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyis kun du bzung zhing tshul khrims 'chal pas yongs su spangs bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Śāriputra, this discourse will be upheld by those who are moral and rejected by those who are immoral.

original: @83a * // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: @83a * // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan na /
translated: Śāriputra, it is because when the truth is taught in this way,

original: byis pa rnams sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: byis pa rnams sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te /
translated: foolish people will suffer.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gang dag gi yan lag dang / gang dag gi rnam pa dang / gang dag gi rtags dang / gang dag gi mtshan mas tshul khrims 'chal pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di las gsungs te /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gang dag gi yan lag dang / gang dag gi rnam pa dang / gang dag gi rtags dang / gang dag gi mtshan mas tshul khrims 'chal pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di las gsungs te /
translated: Śāriputra, the Tathāgata has taught in this discourse the aspects, signs, and indications of those who are immoral.

original: tshul khrims 'chal pa ni tshul khrims kyi gtam la dga' bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal pa ni tshul khrims kyi gtam la dga' bar mi 'gyur /
translated: The immoral do not delight in talk about morality.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i gtam la dga' bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i gtam la dga' bar mi 'gyur /
translated: The uncollected do not delight in talk about concentration.

original: ser sna can ni gtod pa'i gtam la dga' bar mi 'gyur /🔽mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi lhag par nga rgyal med pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas /
analyzed: ser sna can ni gtod pa'i gtam la dga' bar mi 'gyur / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi lhag par nga rgyal med pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas /
translated: The miser does not delight in the teaching of generosity.🔽The one who is conceited does not delight in the teaching of the absence of conceit.

original: g-yang sa chen por ltung bar 'gyur zhing skrag pa chen po skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: g-yang sa chen por ltung bar 'gyur zhing skrag pa chen po skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having heard the teaching of the Buddha, he falls into a great abyss and generates great fear.

original: 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang kha zas lhur len pa ni yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa smras na yid mi bde ba chen po skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang kha zas lhur len pa ni yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa smras na yid mi bde ba chen po skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: The one who is devoted to worldly goods and food generates great mental dissatisfaction when the praise of few desires is taught.

original: chos kyi phung po'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: chos kyi phung po'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Dharmasamgiti Sūtra also says:

original: sh'a ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon rnams te /

original: gzhan du na gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
analyzed: gzhan du na gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
translated: But there are a few who have planted roots of virtue,

original: sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
translated: who have been successful in their past practices, who are moral,

original: dge ba'i chos can de lta bu de dag la bsten par byed /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos can de lta bu de dag la bsten par byed /
translated: and who have virtuous qualities. They serve,

original: bsnyen par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed pa ni ma gtogs te nyung ngo //🔽'od @85a * //
analyzed: bsnyen par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed pa ni ma gtogs te nyung ngo // 'od @85a * //
translated: wait on, and respect those who are like that.

original: srungs chos 'di lta bu'i tshul dang mthun pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni /
analyzed: srungs chos 'di lta bu'i tshul dang mthun pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni /
translated: Kāśyapa, these teachings that are in accord with the Dharma

original: gang zag gnyis kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang zag gnyis kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te /
translated: are pleasing to two kinds of people.

original: gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?

original: bden pa mthong zhing 'khor ba la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa la brtson zhing 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa /
analyzed: bden pa mthong zhing 'khor ba la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa la brtson zhing 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa /
translated: They are those who see the truths and fear saṃsāra, and those who strive in the practice of yoga and desire to attain the fruits.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa'o //
translated: Relying on the ripening of karma, they pursue the Dharma and desire the Dharma.

original: 'od srungs mngon par mi brtson pa chos ma yin pa la lta ba /
analyzed: 'od srungs mngon par mi brtson pa chos ma yin pa la lta ba /
translated: Kāśyapa, those who do not strive, who view what is not Dharma,

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba /
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba /
translated: who are opposed to the ripening of karma,

original: 'jig rten pha rol du kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par mi lta ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol du kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par mi lta ba /
translated: who do not fear the misdeeds of the next world,

original: tshe 'di lhur len pa /
analyzed: tshe 'di lhur len pa /
translated: who are intent on this life,

original: tshe rabs phyi ma lhur mi len pa thams cad kyi sgongs bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: tshe rabs phyi ma lhur mi len pa thams cad kyi sgongs bshad par bya'o //
translated: and who do not strive for future lives—I will explain their downfall.

original: 'od srungs gang dag tha na thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig tsam yang mi bskyed pa'i gti mug pa de dag la ni /
analyzed: 'od srungs gang dag tha na thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig tsam yang mi bskyed pa'i gti mug pa de dag la ni /
translated: Kāśyapa, as for those ignorant ones who do not even give rise to a single thought connected with liberation,

original: ngas 'di lta bu'i chos 'dir skabs mi 'byed kyi /
analyzed: ngas 'di lta bu'i chos 'dir skabs mi 'byed kyi /
translated: I do not grant them an opportunity to practice this kind of Dharma.

original: steng du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag thos nas /
analyzed: steng du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag thos nas /
translated: Having heard these kinds of Dharma teachings,

original: bdag sgrub pa las nyams par rig nas /
analyzed: bdag sgrub pa las nyams par rig nas /
translated: Knowing that they have fallen away from their practice,

original: smad par bya bar sems te /
analyzed: smad par bya bar sems te /
translated: they think that they are to be despised.

original: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: They say, “These are not the words of the Buddha.

original: 'di dag ni rang bzor sbyar ba 'am /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rang bzor sbyar ba 'am /
translated: They are fabrications,

original: bdud kyis mtho btsams nas byas pa'o zhes smra zhing /
analyzed: bdud kyis mtho btsams nas byas pa'o zhes smra zhing /
translated: or they are the work of demons.”

original: de dag 'di ltar skye bo mang po dag log par 'dzin du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag 'di ltar skye bo mang po dag log par 'dzin du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way they lead many people to adopt false views.

original: de dag ni bdag kyang phung la /
analyzed: de dag ni bdag kyang phung la /
translated: They destroy themselves

original: gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed par 'gyur /
translated: and they destroy others.

original: bdag kyang nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur la /
analyzed: bdag kyang nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur la /
translated: They become defiled themselves

original: gzhan yang nyon mongs pa can du byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang nyon mongs pa can du byed par 'gyur te /
translated: and they cause others to become defiled.

original: de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag ni bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag ni bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: In this way, those ignorant people do not set out to benefit themselves or others.

original: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Sūtra on the Full Clarification of the Multitude of Qualities also says,

original: sh'a ri'i bu de la dge slong sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de la dge slong sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa /
translated: Śāriputra, there are monks who have served the Victors of the past.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag ni /🔽phung por 'du shes pa /🔽khams su 'du shes pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag ni / phung por 'du shes pa / khams su 'du shes pa /
translated: The roots of virtue that arise from that🔽are the aggregates,🔽the elements,

original: skye mched du 'du shes pa /
analyzed: skye mched du 'du shes pa /
translated: the sense sources,

original: gang zag tu lta ba /
analyzed: gang zag tu lta ba /
translated: the view of the person,

original: rgan pas gnas brtan du gyur pa /🔽gti mug gis rnyogs pa /
analyzed: rgan pas gnas brtan du gyur pa / gti mug gis rnyogs pa /
translated: the elders,🔽the confused,

original: lam gol ba nas dong ba /
analyzed: lam gol ba nas dong ba /
translated: those who have gone down the wrong path,

original: lhag pa rang rgyal ba /
analyzed: lhag pa rang rgyal ba /
translated: the pratyekabuddhas,

original: log par lta ba de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: log par lta ba de dag gis smras pa /
translated: and those with wrong views.

original: de la mngon par mi dga' zhing rjes su yi mi rang nas stan las langs te 'dong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la mngon par mi dga' zhing rjes su yi mi rang nas stan las langs te 'dong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not rejoice in that, will not delight in it, and will get up from their seats and leave.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de'i tshe lha'i tshogs chen po yid rab tu dga' ba rnams /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de'i tshe lha'i tshogs chen po yid rab tu dga' ba rnams /
translated: Śāriputra, at that time a great assembly of gods will be very pleased

original: da dung yang sh'akya thub pa'i nyan thos rnams gnas @85b so zhes phyogs bzhir sgra shin tu sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: da dung yang sh'akya thub pa'i nyan thos rnams gnas @85b so zhes phyogs bzhir sgra shin tu sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will proclaim in the four directions, ‘The śrāvakas of Śākyamuni are still here.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rigs kyi bu gang dag 'di ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu gang dag 'di ni /
translated: Noble son, those who say, ‘This is the Dharma,

original: gang zag tu lta ba'o zhes yongs su ma dag pa'i bzod pa 'di dag mi 'dod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba nyang nyung dang ldan pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gang zag tu lta ba'o zhes yongs su ma dag pa'i bzod pa 'di dag mi 'dod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba nyang nyung dang ldan pa ma lags so //
translated: Those who do not accept these impure forbearances are not endowed with the roots of virtue.

original: de dag gi bsam pa rig nas lha'i tshogs chen po dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes pa /
analyzed: de dag gi bsam pa rig nas lha'i tshogs chen po dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes pa /
translated: Having understood their thoughts, a great assembly of gods will be delighted and experience joy.

original: yid cher rangs pa de dag ched du brjod pa cher ched du brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid cher rangs pa de dag ched du brjod pa cher ched du brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who are very pleased with the mind will exclaim:

original: sh'a ri'i bu yang dge slong de dag sangs rgyas kyi sras yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu yang dge slong de dag sangs rgyas kyi sras yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can /
translated: Śāriputra, moreover, those bhikṣus who are the Buddha's sons, of inquiring nature,

original: mi dmigs pa'i bzod pa can rnams la mi dga' bar 'gyur /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i bzod pa can rnams la mi dga' bar 'gyur /
translated: endowed with non-apprehending forbearance, will not be pleased.

original: de dag der tshul gcig tu sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag der tshul gcig tu sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will proclaim that in one way there.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar de'i tshe tshogs nas bsdus te tshogs kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar de'i tshe tshogs nas bsdus te tshogs kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro //
translated: Śāriputra, in that way at that time, having gathered from the assembly, they will become the assembly's teacher.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: shin tu zil gyis mnan pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: shin tu zil gyis mnan pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Because of being completely overwhelmed.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar de'i tshe nga'i sras nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis yab kyi gnas dang yab kyi spyod yul la snyan par smra ba yang rnyed par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar de'i tshe nga'i sras nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis yab kyi gnas dang yab kyi spyod yul la snyan par smra ba yang rnyed par mi 'gyur na /
translated: Śāriputra, at that time, my sons, my disciples, will not even find a pleasant place to stay, a place where their father stayed and roamed about.

original: gtsug lag khang du gnas pa dang bkur sti lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang du gnas pa dang bkur sti lta ci smos te /
translated: How much less will they find a temple or a place of honor?

original: de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni gnas med do //
translated: That will be impossible.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de'i tshe 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur pa la ltos /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de'i tshe 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur pa la ltos /
translated: Śāriputra, at that time, see how the Tathāgata will be overcome.

original: gang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na /
analyzed: gang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na /
translated: When I have passed into nirvāṇa,🔽the sons of the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang dag / legs par thub pa legs par zhi ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang dag / legs par thub pa legs par zhi ba /
translated: who are well-tamed, well-pacified,

original: legs par dul zhing mi dmigs pa'i bzod pa can dag de'i shin tu zil gyis gnon cing yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: legs par dul zhing mi dmigs pa'i bzod pa can dag de'i shin tu zil gyis gnon cing yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: well-disciplined, and have the acceptance of non-apprehension, will be completely overcome and abandoned.

original: nga'i sras dag yab kyi spyod yul gang la bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur snyam du gang ngas de dag gi don gyi phyir bskal pa grangs med par nye bar blangs nas /
analyzed: nga'i sras dag yab kyi spyod yul gang la bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur snyam du gang ngas de dag gi don gyi phyir bskal pa grangs med par nye bar blangs nas /
translated: I thought, “How can my sons, who are in the domain of their father, remain in contact with happiness?” I thought, “For their sake I will take up the practice for countless eons.

original: g-yul chen po pham par byas pa dang / rgyal srid bskyangs so //
analyzed: g-yul chen po pham par byas pa dang / rgyal srid bskyangs so //
translated: I will defeat the great army and rule the kingdom.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu de la chos 'dul ba de ltar dang zhing de ltar rgya che ba 'di la chom rkun pa'i tshogs chen po dang dmu rgod kyi tshogs chen pos bsnub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de la chos 'dul ba de ltar dang zhing de ltar rgya che ba 'di la chom rkun pa'i tshogs chen po dang dmu rgod kyi tshogs chen pos bsnub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Śāriputra, in that way, a great army of thieves and a great army of barbarians will destroy this Dharma and Vinaya that is so pure and so vast.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de la ji ltar ngas chos kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba rab tu bskor ba /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de la ji ltar ngas chos kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba rab tu bskor ba /
translated: Śāriputra, in that way, I have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through the Dharma, and I have turned the unsurpassed Dharma wheel that has never been turned in the world by any mendicant, brahmin, god, Māra, Brahmā, or anyone else.

original: chos ma yin pas ma yin pa nga'i gnas @86a * //
analyzed: chos ma yin pas ma yin pa nga'i gnas @86a * //
translated: Not by what is not Dharma.

original: 'di la / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mngon sum du dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mngon sum du dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: In this matter, the world with its gods will be directly under my control.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gang na de ltar mngon sum du gyur pa'i rgyu yod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gang na de ltar mngon sum du gyur pa'i rgyu yod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na /
translated: Śāriputra, when the Tathāgata has passed into Nirvāṇa,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di rgyas par byed pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun par dbang po 'ang dris pa na lan gdab pa'i phyir mi smra'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di rgyas par byed pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun par dbang po 'ang dris pa na lan gdab pa'i phyir mi smra'o //
translated: in a place where there is such a direct cause, those who are spreading this unsurpassed, perfect awakening, if they ask about the faculties in accordance with the Dharma, I will not remain silent in order to not answer them.

original: de'i tshe nga'i sras de dag la yang mi 'jigs pa yang mi ster ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe nga'i sras de dag la yang mi 'jigs pa yang mi ster ro //
translated: At that time, I will also grant fearlessness to those sons of mine.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig lam gyi bzhi mdo chen por sbrang rtsi'i bum pa nye bar bzhag nas /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig lam gyi bzhi mdo chen por sbrang rtsi'i bum pa nye bar bzhag nas /
translated: Śāriputra, it is like this: for example, if a person were to place a pot of honey at a great crossroads,

original: 'di skad du sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnam pa brgyar chag pa 'di las tha na skra'i rtse mo tsam zhig kyang yongs su zos na /
analyzed: 'di skad du sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnam pa brgyar chag pa 'di las tha na skra'i rtse mo tsam zhig kyang yongs su zos na /
translated: He would say, ‘If even a single hair tip’s worth of this hundred-part broken honey pot is eaten,

original: de rga ba dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de rga ba dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: they will not age or die.’

original: sbrang rtsi'i bum pa de la lag na mtshon cha thogs pa mang po ral gri dag gis bsrung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: sbrang rtsi'i bum pa de la lag na mtshon cha thogs pa mang po ral gri dag gis bsrung bar 'gyur la /
translated: And that honey pot would be guarded by many armed men with swords.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de'i tshe srung ma rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'di snyam du /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de'i tshe srung ma rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'di snyam du /
translated: Śāriputra, at that time the guards would constantly think,

original: gang sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnam pa brgyar chag pa 'di las tha na skra'i rtse mo tsam zhig kyang za na /
analyzed: gang sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnam pa brgyar chag pa 'di las tha na skra'i rtse mo tsam zhig kyang za na /
translated: ‘If even a single hair tip’s worth of this hundred-part broken honey pot is eaten,

original: de'i srog kyang med do zhes sems par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i srog kyang med do zhes sems par 'gyur ro //
translated: their lives will be over.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu de la 'ga' zhig 'di snyam du gang zhig sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnam par brgyar chag pa 'di las tha na skra'i rtse mo tsam zhig kyang zos na bdag la rga ba dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de la 'ga' zhig 'di snyam du gang zhig sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnam par brgyar chag pa 'di las tha na skra'i rtse mo tsam zhig kyang zos na bdag la rga ba dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur /
translated: Śāriputra, some people might think, “If I eat even just the tip of a hair’s breadth from this vase of honey that has been broken into a hundred pieces, I will not age or die.

original: gang bdag gi srog kyang yongs su btang nas sbrang rtsi'i bum pa 'di las bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang bdag gi srog kyang yongs su btang nas sbrang rtsi'i bum pa 'di las bza' bar bya'o //
translated: I will give up my life and eat from this vase of honey.

original: gal te mtshon rnams bab par ma gyur pa na sbrang rtsi'i bum pa 'di las bza' bar nus na /
analyzed: gal te mtshon rnams bab par ma gyur pa na sbrang rtsi'i bum pa 'di las bza' bar nus na /
translated: If I am able to eat from this vase of honey without being struck by weapons,

original: phyi nas mtshon gyis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: phyi nas mtshon gyis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur /
translated: then later I will not be afraid of weapons.

original: rga ba dang 'chi ba med pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes sems par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rga ba dang 'chi ba med pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes sems par 'gyur ro //
translated: I will attain a state of no aging and no death.”

original: de srog yongs su btang nas srog la ltos pa med par 'gyur te sbrang rtsi'i bum pa de las len par byed pa de la lag na mtshon cha thogs pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po lhags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de srog yongs su btang nas srog la ltos pa med par 'gyur te sbrang rtsi'i bum pa de las len par byed pa de la lag na mtshon cha thogs pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po lhags par 'gyur ro //
translated: That person, having given up his life, would be indifferent to his life, and would take from that vase of honey. Many hundreds of thousands of living beings with weapons in their hands would come to him.

original: gal te mtshon cha ma lhung ba na sbrang rtsi'i bum pa de las bza' bar nus na /
analyzed: gal te mtshon cha ma lhung ba na sbrang rtsi'i bum pa de las bza' bar nus na /
translated: If he can eat from the honey pot without being harmed by the weapons,

original: de de nas sdug bsngal chen po las grol bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de de nas sdug bsngal chen po las grol bar 'gyur /
translated: then he will be freed from great suffering.

original: rga ba dang 'chi ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rga ba dang 'chi ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be completely freed from old age and death.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar dkar po'i chos mang po rnams bsnub pa'i phyir du bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / gang bdud @86b kyis mngags pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar dkar po'i chos mang po rnams bsnub pa'i phyir du bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / gang bdud @86b kyis mngags pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: Śāriputra, in this way, in order to destroy the many good qualities, Māra the evil one, the Māra class of gods, and the monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen sent by Māra will enter.

original: snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Sūtra on Engaging with Great Compassion also says:

original: gang zhig tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan //
analyzed: gang zhig tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan //
translated: Those who are ethical, who have good qualities,

original: byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod la mkhas //
analyzed: byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod la mkhas //
translated: who abide in love, who are always skilled in patience,

original: legs bsdams 'jam zhing des pa 'byung 'gyur ba //
analyzed: legs bsdams 'jam zhing des pa 'byung 'gyur ba //
translated: who are well restrained, gentle, and peaceful,

original: de ni de yi dus na zil non 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni de yi dus na zil non 'gyur //
translated: will be overwhelmed at that time.

original: gang zhig slar yang gdug pa'i sems ldan zhing //
analyzed: gang zhig slar yang gdug pa'i sems ldan zhing //

original: rab tu byung ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba'o //
translated: Ordination is the purification of higher intention.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni dpung gnyen med par byed pa'o //

original: rab tu byung ba ni dpung gnyen byed pa'o //

original: rab tu byung ba ni mgon byed pa'o //

original: rab tu byung ba ni gnas byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni gnas byed pa'o //

original: khyim na gnas pa ni skyabs med par byed pa'o//
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni skyabs med par byed pa'o//

original: rab tu byung ba ni skyabs byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni skyabs byed pa'o //
translated: Ordination is the making of a refuge.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni gnod sems mang ba'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni gnod sems mang ba'o //

original: rab tu byung ba ni byams pa mang ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni byams pa mang ba'o //
translated: Ordination is the making of non-anger.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni khur khyer ba'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni khur khyer ba'o //
translated: “Living in a home is a burden.

original: rab tu byung ba ni khur bor ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni khur bor ba'o //
translated: Going forth is putting down that burden.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni thug pa med par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni thug pa med par spyod pa'o //

original: rab tu byung ba ni spyod pa thams cad mthar 'byin @91b pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni spyod pa thams cad mthar 'byin @91b pa'o //

original: khyim na gnas pa ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Living in a home is a source of wrongdoing.

original: rab tu byung ba ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'o //

original: khyim na gnas pa ni gdung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni gdung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Living in a home is a source of distress.

original: rab tu byung ba ni gdung bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni gdung bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Going forth is the absence of distress.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Living in a home is a source of afflictions.

original: rab tu byung ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
translated: Going forth is the absence of afflictions.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa'o //

original: rab tu byung ba ni zang zing med pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni zang zing med pa'o //

original: khyim na gnas pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Living in a home is a source of pride.

original: rab tu byung ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'o //
translated: Going forth is the absence of pride.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni nor snying por byed pa'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni nor snying por byed pa'o //
translated: The householder makes wealth his essence.

original: rab tu byung ba ni yon tan snying por byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni yon tan snying por byed pa'o //
translated: The renunciate makes virtue his essence.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni ya mas kyi nad do //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni ya mas kyi nad do //
translated: The householder is a disease.

original: rab tu byung ba ni ya mas kyi nad zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni ya mas kyi nad zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: The renunciate is the cure for the disease.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni 'bri ba'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni 'bri ba'o //
translated: The householder is a loss.

original: rab tu byung ba ni 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni 'phel ba'o //
translated: The renunciate is a gain.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni rnyed par sla ba'o //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni rnyed par sla ba'o //

analyzed: rab tu byung ba ni bskal ba brgya stong du yang rnyed par dka' ba'o //
